John Idowu Conrad Taylor (24 Ọgọstụ 1917 - 7 Nọvemba 1973) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, Onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa (1964 ruo 1967), na onye ọka ikpe mbụ nke Lagos Steeti (bido n'afọ 1967 ruo 1973).
A mụrụ John Taylor na Lagos ma bụrụ nwa nke anọ nke Eusebius James Alexander Taylor (onye ọka iwu a ma ama na onye mba) na Remilekun Alice Taylor (née Williams)
Ọ gara Olowogbowo Methodist School maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Methodist Boys High School maka akụkụ nke agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ hapụrụ England n'afọ 1929 ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Culford School na Bury St
Edmunds, n'etiti Eprel afọ 1929 na Julaị afọ 1936
Ọ banyere King's College London n'afọ 1936 iji gụọ iwu, tupu ọ gafee Brasenose College, Oxford n'afọ 1937 ebe ọ bụ Boxing Blue
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke abụọ na Honour School of Jurisprudence ma mesịa a kpọọ ya na Bar na Middle Temple na 14 Jenụwarị 1941
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa na Disemba 1941 wee sonye na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nna ya, nke o mechara gaa mgbe nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1947.
Taylor nwere ịrị elu ngwa ngwa site na ọkwa iwu Naịjirịa, nke mechara bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, Western Nigeria, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na itoolu
N'afọ 1960, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa na, n'afọ 1964, onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Federal Territory of Lagos
Mgbe e kere Lagos Steeti n'afọ 1967, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe mbụ nke steeti ọhụrụ ahụ.
N'afọ1967 Justice Taylor ghọrọ Pro-Chancellor nke Mahadum Lagos, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1973 mgbe ọ dị afọ 56

Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, onye isi ala Naijiria, General Yakubu Gowon, kwuru okwu nke o kwuru, sị: "N'oge nrụrụ aka, aghụghọ azụ na ịhụnanya maka ọkwa ọrụ na ike na-aghọ omume ọma ngwa ngwa, Maazị Justice Taylor pụtara ìhè n'etiti ìgwè mmadụ ahụ site na nkewa nke wetara nnukwu ùgwù na High Office of a Judge
O nwekwara nnukwu okporo ámá na Victoria Island, Lagos aha ya.
